title: AI Content Writer
subtitle: Generate high-quality blog posts, social captions, and marketing copy at scale
description: Deploy AI content writers that produce SEO-optimized articles, engaging social media posts, email campaigns, and product descriptions—all matching your brand voice and style guidelines.

benefits.title: SEO-Optimized Articles
benefits.description: Generate comprehensive blog posts with proper keyword placement, meta descriptions, header structure, and internal linking that ranks on Google.

benefits.title: Brand Voice Consistency
benefits.description: Train AI on your existing content to replicate tone, style, vocabulary, and messaging guidelines across every piece it creates.

benefits.title: Multi-Format Content
benefits.description: Transform one piece of content into multiple formats: blog post → social captions → email newsletter → video script—automatically.

benefits.title: Research Integration
benefits.description: AI conducts real-time research using web search, competitor analysis, and industry reports to create factually accurate, up-to-date content.

features.title: Long-Form Blog Writing
features.description: Produce 2,000+ word articles complete with outlines, subheadings, examples, statistics, and calls-to-action tailored to your audience.

features.title: Social Media Content
features.description: Generate platform-specific posts for LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook—including captions, hashtags, and optimal posting times.

features.title: Email Campaign Copy
features.description: Write subject lines, preview text, and email body copy optimized for opens, clicks, and conversions based on A/B test learnings.

features.title: Product Descriptions
features.description: Create compelling ecommerce product copy highlighting features, benefits, use cases, and addressing common customer questions.

features.title: SEO Optimization
features.description: Automatically insert target keywords, optimize readability scores, suggest internal links, and generate meta tags for search visibility.

features.title: Content Repurposing
features.description: Take existing content and rewrite it for different audiences, update outdated information, or adapt it to new platforms and formats.

useCases.title: Weekly Blog Publishing
useCases.description: Maintain consistent publishing schedule by generating 4-8 SEO blog posts per month on industry topics, company updates, and thought leadership.

useCases.title: Social Media Calendar
useCases.description: Populate 30 days of social content in minutes: product announcements, industry news commentary, customer success stories, and engagement posts.

useCases.title: Product Launch Content
useCases.description: Rapidly create announcement blogs, feature explainer articles, comparison guides, FAQs, and promotional email sequences for new product releases.

metrics.efficiency: Produce 10x more content with the same team
metrics.speed: Draft blog posts in under 10 minutes
